publicationStmt.publisher: [J. Dawson] and are to bee sould at Georg Humble at the White-horse in popeshead Alley,

notesStmt.note: An abridgement of: Speed, John. The theatre of the empire of Great Britaine, the text of which is mainly based on: Camden, William. Britannia.
Most maps were engraved by Pieter van den Keere.--STC.
A2v line 14 of text ends: for our.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
